name: divmuli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), c0))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), c0)), wne(c1, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), c0))
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c1, nat0), wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), c0)))

cumulated.origin:

-| wne(c1, nat0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c1, nat0), wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c2), c0)))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)

comment: Relationship between division and multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
